frontmatter.name: swConstrainedCornerAction_e
frontmatter.description: Actions to take if the corner to be filleted is constrained or has a dimension.

title: swConstrainedCornerAction_e
description: Actions to take if the corner to be filleted is constrained or has a dimension.

values.description: = Delete the constraint or dimension and add the fillet
= Ask the user whether to delete the geometry or stop processing
= Keep the constraint or dimension by creating a virtual intersection point before adding the fillet
= Do not delete the constraint or dimension and do not create the fillet
